title: [$250] Expense - Admin can submit expense to member's workspace chat via FAB
issue_repo_steps:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.0.81-1 **Reproducible in staging?:** Y **Reproducible in production?:** N **If this was caught on HybridApp, is this reproducible on New Expensify Standalone?:** N/A **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** N/A **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+2390223d@applause.expensifail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause - Internal Team **Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Precondition: - User is logged in with Expensifail account 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Create a workspace 3. Invite a few Expensifail users (do not invite Gmail) to the workspace (do not open workspace chat with members) 4. Go to FAB > Create expense > Manual 5. Enter amount > Next 6. Select member's workspace chat (the workspace chat name will be the workspace name because the workspace chat is not opened in Step 3) 7. Submit the expense ## Expected Result: In Step 6, member's workspace chat should not appear in "Workspace" list when submitting expense ## Actual Result: In Step 6, member's workspace chat appears in "Workspace" list when submitting expense and admin can send expense to member's workspace chat This issue happens when member's workspace chat is not opened yet ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Which of our officially supported platforms is this issue occurring on? - [ ] Android: Standalone - [ ] Android: HybridApp - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: Standalone - [ ] iOS: HybridApp - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos
Add any screenshot/video evidence
